# oneNeuron_pypi
oneNeuron_pypi

##How to use this
```python
from oneNeuron.perceptron import 

##get X and Y and then use below commands
model_OR=Perceptron(eta=eta,epochs=epochs) model_OR.fit(X,y)
```
